resources.string: The huge tank arsenal at your disposal includes more than 220 vehicles from Germany, France, the Soviet Union, USA, Great Britain and China, and from the 1930’s to the 1950’s."

World of Tanks is a team-based massively multiplayer online game dedicated to armored warfare in the mid-20th century. Throw yourself into epic tank battles shoulder to shoulder with other steel cowboys to dominate the world with tank supremacy!

Engine Power 450 hp 
Speed Limit 34/10 km/h 
Traverse 18 deg / s 
Power/Wt Ratio 9.49 hp/t
 Pivot No
 Hull Armor 75/75/70 mm 
Turret Armor 90/75/75 mm

The development was started in late 1938. A prototype was built in August 1939. The first deployment was on the Mannerheim Line in December 1939. 2,769 vehicles were manufactured from March 1940 to August 1942.Participated in the war with Finland and the Great Patriotic War."
